text: Alfredo del Águila Estrella (3 January 1935 – 26 July 2018) was a Mexican football player. He was born in Mexico City. He played for Mexico in the 1962 FIFA World Cup. He also played for Deportivo Toluca. Del Águila died on 26 July 2018 at the age of 83. == References == Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Mexican footballers Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City
title: Alfredo del Águila
